name: Dicefunctional Defenders
description:
Congratulations, you've just won a bunch of money at the casino! The staff are in dismay as the machines are supposed to be rigged so that you could never win, but you just got extra lucky and beat the system. Now unfortunately, the casino staff are after your earnings, and you must roll the dice (literally!) to protect your hard-earned cash from the greedy casino staff! How long can you hold out against their advances?

Dicefunctional Defenders was made during the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Meet the Team

Patrick Korie - Programming, SFX
Arthur Senna - Programming, Project Manager
Ronan Daniel - Programming, Art/Tech Art, UI Design
Benroy Chayson - Art/Animation, Music
